The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 December is 1,567,128 (2,784.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 07 December, there were 90,589 new confirmed cases (160.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 30 November, there were 85,625 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 6% (4,964 extra cases).
